text: Good food. Good prices. Helpful customer service. The manager behind the counter spoke perfect English so that put us at ease.   Smoked meat good. Poutine good. Hotdogs small but very good.   All enjoyed!
Bon fastfood, poutine excellente et sous marin spécial succulent, portion généreuse. Ils acceptent maintenant la carte de débit.

Pooh and I were here this morning after a good bike ride. This place knows how to make crisp bacon!! The eggs were done to perfection and the beans were not too sweet. Great service to boot. We'll be going back for sure!
